WelcomeHeadphones: Make sure you're in a quiet environment and wearing good quality headphones. You'll need them for the diagnosis.
WelcomeDisclaimer: You should check with a doctor beforehand. Lullaby doesn't replace a diagnostic and treatment plan created by a professional.
DiagnosticQuitConfirm: Are you sure you want to quit the diagnostic? You'll lose all progress if you do
PutHeadphonesOn: Put your headphones on and turn down the volume of your phone to the minimum
PutHeadphonesOnComputer: Put your headphones on and turn down the volume of your computer to the minimum
RaiseVolumeNoise: Raise the volume on your phone until you can comfortably hear the white noise
RaiseVolumeNoiseComputer: Raise the volume on your computer until you can comfortably hear the white noise
AdjustVolume: Adjust the volume slider until the noise matches your Tinnitus' volume
WhichSideLouder: On which side is your Tinnitus heard louder?
FindFrequencyIntro: Now we'll find the frequency of your Tinnitus
FindFrequencyLeftEar: You'll hear a few tones in your left ear to find it
FindFrequencyRightEar: You'll hear a few tones in your right ear to find it
FrequencyPrompt1: Does your Tinnitus sound lower or higher than this?
FrequencyPrompt2: Let's try another one. Higher or lower?
FrequencyPrompt11: This is the last one and we're done.
ExactFrequencyIntro: Now we'll pinpoint the exact frequency of your Tinnitus
ExactFrequencyPrompt: Adjust the slider until the tone closely matches your Tinnitus.
OctaveIntro: Lastly, let's make sure we have the right frequency
OctavePrompt: Which of these sounds is closest to your ringing?
BothEarsPromptLeft: Do you also hear a ringing on your left ear?
BothEarsPromptRight: Do you also hear a ringing on your right ear?
ResultsIntro: Now that we have the ringing figured out, it's time to start treating it
NoSymptoms: Since you don't have noticeable symptoms, Lullaby won't be of much use to you. We recommend consulting with a physician if you're still looking for treatment.
EmailPrompt: Tell us your email and we'll send it to you as a reminder
ForgotVolume: Forgot how to set the volume?
InstructionsTitle: Instructions for the Lullaby Tinnitus Treatment
NeedHeadphonesDescription: Over ear closed headphones are the best choice if you have them.
NeedDiagnosticDescription2: will help you get that in just a few minutes.
InstructionVolume: Set the volume on your device
InstructionVolumeDescription: Set your device's volume to a comfortable level. Make sure you don't change it during the day, as that can affect the treatment.
InstructionVolumeApp: Set the volume of the treatment
InstructionVolumeAppDescription: Make sure the volume is slightly below your Tinnitus' volume. Try to find the a sweet spot where you can only hear your Tinnitus if you are paying attention to it.
UseHoursDay: Use it at least 3 hours a day
UseHoursDayDescription: You can split this into multiple sessions. The more you use the treatment, the better it'll work.
UseDiagnosisWeek: Do a diagnosis once a week
UseDiagnosisWeekDescription: As the treatment progresses, your Tinnitus frequency will change. When that happens, you'll need to find your new frequency for the treatment to keep being effective.
UseSleeping: Try using it while you sleep
UseSleepingDescription: Not only it'll help you sleep by masking your Tinnitus, but it can also get you a few more hours of treatment. Keep in mind that you need to be wearing earphones for this to be effective.
ErrorDescription: The page you're looking for doesn't exist. Here's one that does:
